title: Season 8 Mastery
body:
I was just wondering if mastery levels are reset after each season, as I've worked really hard to get good mastery on my champs and I'd hate to see it go down the drain. Any responses regarding this question would be greatly appreciated. :)
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body: They do not. The ability to earn chests on champions does, so you can earn a chest on every champion again, but the mastery grading is all continuous.
